head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TOFEL, JOSEPH M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TOFEL, JOSEPH M.

block.p: TOFEL-Joseph M. Of Briarcliff Manor, NY. On May 22. Age 71. Retiree from IBM, Harrison NY. Husband of Annie Tofel. Father of Karen Doskow and Clifford Tofel. Brother of Elaine Colton and the late Harriett Crystal. Grandfather of Emily and Sydney Doskow, Nia and Lily Tofel. Funeral service Thursday 12 noon at the BallardDurand Funeral Home, 2 Maple Avenue, White Plains, NY. Interment Sharon Gardens Cemetery. Memorial contributions to the American Cancer Society would be appreciated.
